title: Photon-trapping microstructures enable high-speed high-efficiency silicon photodiodes
title_cn: 捕获光子的微结构可实现高速高效的硅光电二极管
abstract: High-speed, high-efficiency photodetectors play an important role in optical communication links that are increasingly being used in data centres to handle higher volumes of data traffic and higher bandwidths, as big data and cloud computing continue to grow exponentially. Monolithic integration of optical components with signal-processing electronics on a single silicon chip is of paramount importance in the drive to reduce cost and improve performance. We report the first demonstration of micro- and nanoscale holes enabling light trapping in a silicon photodiode, which exhibits an ultrafast impulse response (full-width at half-maximum) of 30 ps and a high efficiency of more than 50%, for use in data-centre optical communications. The photodiode uses micro- and nanostructured holes to enhance, by an order of magnitude, the absorption efficiency of a thin intrinsic layer of less than 2 µm thickness and is designed for a data rate of 20 gigabits per second or higher at a wavelength of 850 nm. Further optimization can improve the efficiency to more than 70%.
abstract_cn: 随着大数据和云计算的持续增长，高速，高效的光电探测器在光通信链路中起着重要的作用，光通信链路越来越多地用于数据中心，以处理更大的数据流量和更高的带宽。光学组件与信号处理电子器件在单个硅芯片上的单片集成对于降低成本和提高性能至关重要。我们报告了第一个演示，演示了在硅光电二极管中捕获光的微米级和纳米级孔，该孔具有30ps的超快脉冲响应（半峰全宽）和50％以上的高效率，用于数据中心光通信。光电二极管使用微结构和纳米结构的空穴将厚度小于2微米的本征层的吸收效率提高一个数量级，并设计为20速率的数据速率。波长在850＆＃8197; nm时达到每秒千兆比特或更高。进一步的优化可以将效率提高到70％以上。

title: Optical holonomic single quantum gates with a geometric spin under a zero field
title_cn: 在零场下具有几何自旋的光学完整单量子门
abstract: The realization of fast fault-tolerant quantum gates on a single spin is the core requirement for solid-state quantum-information processing. As polarized light shows geometric interference, spin coherence is also geometrically controlled with light via the spin–orbit interaction. Here, we show that a geometric spin in a degenerate subspace of a spin-1 electronic system under a zero field in a nitrogen vacancy centre in diamond allows implementation of optical non-adiabatic holonomic quantum gates. The geometric spin under quasi-resonant light exposure undergoes a cyclic evolution in the spin–orbit space, and acquires a geometric phase or holonomy that results in rotations about an arbitrary axis by any angle defined by the light polarization and detuning. This enables universal holonomic quantum gates with a single operation. We demonstrate a complete set of Pauli quantum gates using the geometric spin preparation and readout techniques. The new scheme opens a path to holonomic quantum computers and repeaters.
abstract_cn: 在一次自旋中实现快速容错量子门是固态量子信息处理的核心要求。由于偏振光显示出几何干涉，因此自旋相干性也通过自旋轨道相互作用用光进行几何控制。在这里，我们显示出在自旋1电子系统的简并子空间中，在金刚石的氮空位中心中的零场下的几何自旋，可以实现光学非绝热完整的量子门。准共振曝光下的几何自旋在自旋轨道空间中经历循环演化，并获得几何相位或完整性，从而导致绕任意轴旋转由光偏振和失谐定义的任何角度。这样一来，即可实现通用完整的量子门。我们使用几何自旋准备和读出技术演示了一整套保利量子门。新方案为完整的量子计算机和中继器开辟了道路。

title: Monolithic integration of hybrid perovskite single crystals with heterogenous substrate for highly sensitive X-ray imaging
title_cn: 杂化钙钛矿单晶与异质衬底的单片集成，用于高灵敏度X射线成像
abstract: The monolithic integration of new optoelectronic materials with well-established inexpensive silicon circuitry is leading to new applications, functionality and simple readouts. Here, we show that single crystals of hybrid perovskites can be integrated onto virtually any substrates, including silicon wafers, through facile, low-temperature, solution-processed molecular bonding. The brominated (3-aminopropyl)triethoxysilane molecule binds the native oxide of silicon and participates in the perovskite crystal with its ammonium bromide group, yielding a solid mechanical and electrical connection. The dipole of the bonding molecule reduces device noise while retaining signal intensity. The reduction of dark current enables the detectors to be operated at increased bias, resulting in a sensitivity of 2.1 × 104 µC Gyair−1 cm−2 under 8 keV X-ray radiation, which is over a thousand times higher than the sensitivity of amorphous selenium detectors. X-ray imaging with both perovskite pixel detectors and linear array detectors reduces the total dose by 15–120-fold compared with state-of-the-art X-ray imaging systems.
abstract_cn: 新的光电材料与成熟的廉价硅电路的单片集成正导致新的应用，功能和简单的读数。在这里，我们显示出杂化钙钛矿的单晶可以通过便捷，低温，固溶处理的分子键合集成到几乎所有基板上，包括硅晶片。溴化的（3-氨基丙基）三乙氧基硅烷分子结合硅的天然氧化物，并通过其溴化铵基团参与钙钛矿晶体的形成，产生牢固的机械和电气连接。键合分子的偶极子可在保持信号强度的同时降低器件噪声。暗电流的减小使检测器可以在增加的偏置下工作，从而导致灵敏度为2.1＆＃2151;＆＃2151; 10 4 ＆＃8197;＆＃181;。 C＆＃8197; Gy air ＆＃8722; 1 ＆＃8197; cm ＆＃8722; 2 在8＆＃8197; keV X-下射线辐射，比非晶硒探测器的灵敏度高一千倍以上。与最新的X射线成像系统相比，钙钛矿像素探测器和线性阵列探测器进行X射线成像可将总剂量减少15到120倍。

title: Chip-based wide field-of-view nanoscopy
title_cn: 基于芯片的宽视野纳米显微镜
abstract: Present optical nanoscopy techniques use a complex microscope for imaging and a simple glass slide to hold the sample. Here, we demonstrate the inverse: the use of a complex, but mass-producible optical chip, which hosts the sample and provides a waveguide for the illumination source, and a standard low-cost microscope to acquire super-resolved images via two different approaches. Waveguides composed of a material with high refractive-index contrast provide a strong evanescent field that is used for single-molecule switching and fluorescence excitation, thus enabling chip-based single-molecule localization microscopy. Additionally, multimode interference patterns induce spatial fluorescence intensity variations that enable fluctuation-based super-resolution imaging. As chip-based nanoscopy separates the illumination and detection light paths, total-internal-reflection fluorescence excitation is possible over a large field of view, with up to 0.5 mm × 0.5 mm being demonstrated. Using multicolour chip-based nanoscopy, we visualize fenestrations in liver sinusoidal endothelial cells.
abstract_cn: 当前的光学纳米技术使用复杂的显微镜进行成像，并使用简单的载玻片固定样品。在这里，我们证明了相反的情况：使用复杂但可大量生产的光学芯片，该芯片可容纳样品并为照明源提供波导，并使用标准的低成本显微镜通过两种不同的方法获取超分辨图像。由具有高折射率对比度的材料组成的波导提供了一个强大的渐逝场，可用于单分子切换和荧光激发，从而使基于芯片的单分子定位显微镜成为可能。此外，多模干涉图样会引起空间荧光强度变化，从而使基于波动的超分辨率成像成为可能。由于基于芯片的显微技术将照明和检测光路分开，因此大范围内的全内反射荧光激发是可能的，最大可达0.5＆＃8197; mm＆＃8201;＆＃215;＆＃8201; 0.5 ＆＃8197; mm正在演示。使用基于彩色芯片的纳米显微镜，我们可以观察到肝窦内皮细胞的开窗情况。
